meanings.definition: To dive headfirst into water with arms extended and landing on one's stomach.
meanings.sent1: The kids were bellyflopping into the pool during the hot summer day.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys bellyflopping off the diving board at the pool.
meanings.sent3: After watching a bellyflopping competition, she decided to give it a try.
meanings.sent4: The diver's graceful entry into the water was a stark contrast to the bellyflopping beginners.
meanings.sent5: The loud splash from the bellyflopping echoed across the pool.

meanings.definition: The act of performing a bellyflop.
meanings.sent1: His bellyflopping at the pool competition earned him a lot of laughs.
meanings.sent2: The lifeguard cringed at the loud sound of the bellyflopping.
meanings.sent3: The synchronized bellyflopping routine at the talent show was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The bellyflopping contest at the beach was a hilarious sight to see.
meanings.sent5: The audience erupted into laughter at the clumsy bellyflopping display.

meanings.definition: The sound made when someone bellyflops into water.
meanings.sent1: The bellyflopping noise startled the ducks by the pond.
meanings.sent2: The bellyflopping sound echoed through the canyon.
meanings.sent3: The bellyflopping noise was mistaken for thunder during the storm.
meanings.sent4: The bellyflopping sound was like a drumbeat in the quiet lake.
meanings.sent5: The bellyflopping noise was music to the ears of the spectators.
